summary.para: Contains information about a disk partition.
summary.div: Note PARTITION_INFORMATION has been superseded by the structure.

member.name: PARTITION_INFORMATION.StartingOffset
member.summary: The starting offset of the partition.

member.name: PARTITION_INFORMATION.PartitionLength
member.summary: The length of the partition, in bytes.

member.name: PARTITION_INFORMATION.HiddenSectors
member.summary: The number of hidden sectors in the partition.

member.name: PARTITION_INFORMATION.PartitionType
member.summary: The type of partition. For a list of values, seeDisk Partition Types.

member.name: PARTITION_INFORMATION.BootIndicator
member.summary: If this member is TRUE, the partition is bootable.

member.name: PARTITION_INFORMATION.RecognizedPartition
member.summary: If this member is TRUE, the partition is of a recognized type.

member.name: PARTITION_INFORMATION.RewritePartition
member.summary: If this member is TRUE, the partition information has changed. When you change a partition (withIOCTL_DISK_SET_DRIVE_LAYOUT), the system uses this member to determine which partitions have changed and need their information rewritten.
